dict.string:
RMAN='/Library/Application Support/Apple/Developer Tools/Plug-ins/DocViewerPlugIn.xcplugin/Contents/Resources/rman'
[[ -n $TM_SELECTED_TEXT ]] && TM_CURRENT_WORD=$TM_SELECTED_TEXT
# PolyglotMan has nicer output if [[ -x "$RMAN" ]]; then man $TM_CURRENT_WORD | "$RMAN" -fHTML; else GROFF_TYPESETTER=html man -t $TM_CURRENT_WORD; fi
